name: IslamQA - Scholarly Fatwas & Answers
description: Extensive collection of Islamic legal rulings (fatwas) and scholarly answers to questions about Islamic practice, beliefs, and jurisprudence. Answers are based on Quran, Sunnah, and scholarly consensus.

parameters.questionId: Unique numeric ID for each fatwa/answer

search.resultLinkSelector: a.result-title, a[href*='/answers/'], h2 a, h3 a
search.searchTips: Search in English or Arabic. Questions cover all aspects of Islamic practice and belief.

contentPage.description: Answer pages contain the question, detailed scholarly answer with evidence from Quran and Sunnah, and source attribution

title: h1.single-title
h1
.question-title
[class*='title']

source.description: Scholarly source or author of the answer

extraction.contentNotes: Fatwa pages contain: the original question, detailed answer with Quranic verses and hadith as evidence, and scholarly references. Most answers cite specific evidence.

rendering.notes: IslamQA uses JavaScript for content rendering. Search results especially need time to load.

aiNotes: When citing IslamQA, include the question ID and full URL. Format: 'IslamQA #[ID] - [Title]'. The answers often contain hadith references that should be verified on sunnah.com. Direct URL format: islamqa.info/en/answers/[ID]
